original: Linde, Hilding Laugén, direktör, Kalmar, f. 23/10/83 i Malmö av tulluppsyn :man Nils L. o. Elna Chris-tensson. G. 35 m. Dagmar Brolin. Barn : Lars Hilding f. 36, Karin Ida Maria 40. Genomg. hand :högsk. i Tyskl., tekn. sk, i Engl. Dir. i A-B Siefvert & Fornander i Kalmar o. i Maskin-fabr. A-B Norrbacken i Blomstermåla. Led. av stadsfullm. sed. 27, suppl. i beredn:utsk. sed. 32, v. ordf. sed. 39, led. av drätselkamm. sed. 21, v. ordf. sed. 35, led. av styr. f. h. folksk. sed. 27, ordf. sed. 35, led. av arb:lösh:-komm. o. hjälpkomm. 27-33, ordf. i idr :nd sed. 22, huv :man o. styr:sux^pl. i Kalmar Stads Sparbank sed. 33, led. sed. 42, landstingsman 46.
translated: Linde, Hilding Laugén, director, Kalmar, born on October 23, 1883 in Malmö to customs inspector Nils L. and Elna Christensson. Married in 1935 to Dagmar Brolin. Children: Lars Hilding born in 1936, Karin Ida Maria born in 1940. Education: studied at a university in Germany, technical school in England. Director at A-B Siefvert & Fornander in Kalmar and at Maskinfabriken A-B Norrbacken in Blomstermåla. Member of the city council since 1927, serving as deputy in the committee since 1932, vice chairman since 1939, member of the finance committee since 1921, vice chairman since 1935, member of the board for elementary schools since 1927, chairman since 1935, member of the unemployment and relief committees from 1927 to 1933, chairman of the sports association since 1922, chairman and member of the supervisory board at Kalmar City Savings Bank since 1933, member since 1942, county council member since 1946.

memberOf.name: Kalmar City Savings Bank
memberOf.roleName: Chairman and Member of Supervisory Board
